title: Cracker Screen Pixel 2XL. Any option to get it replaced instead of repairing?
content:
I have got my Pixel 2XL's Screen Cracked. The phone is under the 2 years warranty period.
I checked with repairing costs, they are too high. I wanna know if there is an option where I can pay a little amount and get a refurbished pixel 2xl phone ?

Also, is there any option where I can trade in this phone for a pixel 3/3a/XL phone ??

I m in India....
